description: When rookie detective Kacie Castle is overpowered and taken hostage, Xander Corvus takes out his legal frustrations on the helpless cop. Kacie is handcuffed with her own cuffs, choked, bent over her desk and fucked hard in the ass before being dragged to the Evidence Room where Xander collects his belongs. The bound and helpless cop is humiliated, beaten and fucked some more before taking Xander's huge load all over her face and her badge.
title: Rookie Detective Held Anal Hostage
